column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////First time here this past weekend and I'll definitely be back. You kinda just sit at whatever is available and stand in line to order your food and drinks
column2: the somebody will bring it to you. I went on a Saturday morning so it was a little packed and parking btw is a nightmare. Only reason it's getting 4 stars and not 5 is the whole parking situation. I had to drive around for 25 mins before something became a available. Backstreets/side streets/ the miniature lot they have.. everything was full.
